sentences.en: A brown earthenware mug with a little green frog at the bottom.
sentences.cn: 就是一种褐色的陶土杯,杯底内画有一只绿色的小青蛙.

sentences.en: A prince turns into a frog in this cartoon fairytale.
sentences.cn: 在这个卡通童话里王子变成了一只青蛙。

sentences.en: A tadpole metamorphoses into a frog.
sentences.cn: 蝌蚪会变成青蛙。

sentences.en: A tadpole transforms into a frog.
sentences.cn: 蝌蚪会变成青蛙.

sentences.en: As a tadpole changes into a frog, its tail is gradually absorbed.
sentences.cn: 蝌蚪变成蛙, 它的尾巴就逐渐被吸收掉.

sentences.en: Both the toad and frog are amphibian.
sentences.cn: 蟾蜍和青蛙都是两栖动物.

sentences.en: Frog can live both on land and in water.
sentences.cn: 青蛙既能生活在陆地上也能生活在水中.

sentences.en: He was frog-marched through the kitchen and out into the yard.
sentences.cn: 他被扭住双臂强推着走过厨房，来到院子里。

sentences.en: Maybe a little frog on my hip, or a gecko.
sentences.cn: 也许在臀部刺一只小青蛙还是壁虎什么的。

sentences.en: One of them had a frog - mug.
sentences.cn: 四个人当中不知是谁有一只青蛙杯.

sentences.en: She was really of the cold frog.
sentences.cn: 她真的很害怕这只冰冷的青蛙。

sentences.en: The boy poked the frog with a stick to make it jump.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩用棍子拨动青蛙,以便让它跳起.

sentences.en: the croaking of frogs
sentences.cn: 蛙鸣

sentences.en: The frog darted out its tongue to catch a mosquito.
sentences.cn: 这只青蛙突然伸出舌头捕捉蚊子。

sentences.en: The frog hopped along the shore of the pond.
sentences.cn: 那只青蛙沿着池塘边跳跃.

sentences.en: The frog plopped back into the water.
sentences.cn: 青蛙扑通一声跳回水中。

sentences.en: The frog plopped into the pond.
sentences.cn: 青蛙扑通一声跳进池塘.

sentences.en: The snake got outside of a frog.
sentences.cn: 蛇吞青蛙.

sentences.en: The tadpole has become a frog.
sentences.cn: 这个蝌蚪已长成青蛙。

sentences.en: They arrested the men and frog-marched them to the local police station.
sentences.cn: 他们逮捕了这些人，并把他们押送到当地警察局。

sentences.en: We dissected a frog in biology class.
sentences.cn: 我们在生物课上解剖了一只青蛙。

phrases.phrase: have a frog in one's throat
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（因嗓音嘶哑）失声；很难发声

trans.tran_cn: 青蛙，〈侮辱〉青蛙佬，对法国人的蔑称，[交]铁路辙叉，饰扣，挂环
trans.tran_en: a small green animal that lives near water and has long legs for jumping
